snippet.title: First 'National Hockey Card Day' in U.S. on Saturday
snippet.description: (Washington Capitals), Henrik Lundqvist (New York Rangers), Pekka Rinne (Nashville Predators), Jaromir Jagr (Philadelphia Flyers) and Zdeno Chara (Boston Bruins). In the "Stars in Stripes" set look for American-born players like Ryan Kesler, Patrick Kane, Ryan Miller, Zach Parise and rookie Andy Miele. And in the "American Icons" set collectors can capture cards of legends like Willie O'Ree, Mike Modano...

snippet.title: Bachman & Turner, Three Days Grace and Inward Eye to perform at 2011 Molson Canadian NHL Face-Off
snippet.description: 's Hockey Night in Canada along with a stellar lineup of entertainment to fans in Winnipeg and across the country," said Julie Bristow, Executive Director, Studio and Unscripted Programming for CBC. Canadian rock icons Randy Bachman (@randycbachman) and Fred Turner, the two men at the heart of legendary band Bachman-Turner Overdrive, reunited in 2010 for the first time in 20 years as Bachman & Turner...
